Annotate the web

Inkwell is a minimal and lightweight drawing tool designed to simplify website annotation. It makes it effortless to add notes, highlights, doodles, and more directly onto webpages. With an intuitive interface and essential features, Inkwell makes annotating websites a breeze and something you'll find yourself consistently revisiting.

Key Features:

Copy/Paste: Duplicate annotations seamlessly to enhance efficiency and productivity.

Scroll without Losing Work: Maintain your focus with uninterrupted annotation sessions while browsing.

Smooth Lines: Achieve precision and clarity with smooth line rendering for professional-looking annotations.

Undo/Redo: Easily correct mistakes to ensure accuracy and polish in your annotations.

Click and Drag Objects: Arrange annotations easily by clicking and dragging them to your desired location.

Different Size Brushes: Customize brush sizes to suit your annotation style, from fine details to broad strokes.

Choose Colors: Select from various colors to make your annotations visually appealing and easy to distinguish.

Transparency: Adjust transparency for subtle or prominent annotations that seamlessly integrate with the webpage.

Use Cases:

Highlighting Key Areas: Draw attention to important sections or critical points on web pages to improve comprehension and focus.

Redacting Information: Safely conceal sensitive data on webpages before sharing them, 
ensuring privacy and compliance with regulations.

Doodle Away: Spice up those meetings, stimulate your creativity, and add fun annotations or doodles.

Interactive Presentations: Engage your audience by annotating webpages in real-time during presentations, adding emphasis and clarity to your content.

We care about your experience:

At Inkwell, we aim to create delightful extensions that spark joy and curiosity. We thrive on your feedback and are committed to evolving our tools to meet your needs. Crafted by a passionate team that builds tools they love to use, we emphasize simplicity and effectiveness in everything we create.

While there will always be a free version of Inkwell, we might introduce a premium version in the future. Our dedication extends to how we develop, release, and support our software, ensuring a positive experience for all our users.
